title: Brilliant Face For Moto 360
summary: Most striking thing about this piece is its design
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Frillroid focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable. Key custom features:-• Latest Weather updates• Classic Design• Ultimate readability • Clean and simplistic look • Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Frillroid focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-
• Latest Weather updates
• Classic Design
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Battery Drain Lovely looking watch face but used up my full charge by the evening so had to go to the cinema without it. This does need to be addressed.
Works OK but... Settings don't save. Need more customizations like date format, lose the leading zero in hour, ability to change time the face is at full brightness (way too short now).
